titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1435) to amend the Clean Air Act to prevent the elimination of the sale of internal combustion engines.
Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1435) to amend the Clean Air Act to prevent the elimination of the sale of internal combustion engines.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 118-195, by Mr. Burgess.
Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 1435 with 1 hour of general debate. Motion to recommit allowed. Bill is closed to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 34.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 681.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 214 - 198 (Roll no. 388).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 215 - 200 (Roll no. 389).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: This resolution sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1435) to amend the Clean Air Act to prevent the elimination of the sale of internal combustion engines.
